mdRecord.dcterms:title: Students of Architecture
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notation on back, "Professor Clifford Mochon of the University of Virginia Department of Architecture discusses with students their plan for the development of part of the city which they will show members of the Lynchburg planning commission and city officials. In the group are, left to right, James Robert Walker, Newport News; David V. Cederquist, Norfolk; James Dexter Bogg, Portsmouth; Oscar E. Northen, Jr., South Hill; James P. Fox, Richmond; Williard C. Rhodes, Lynchburg, and Mr. Mochon."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
